game.name: BlockUP
game.description:
Are you seeking for the games which will put your quick-thinking and reflexes to test? If so, you must try out Block Up game right to give your gaming senses an ultimate treat. Make sure that you focus on the details in order to overcome all the hurdles that come on your way while exploring this brand new puzzle game. You also have to apply your fast reaction time to ensure your win in the end. One thing you will get for sure i.e. unlimited fun and entertainment even with a gameplay of a few minutes. 
It is undoubtedly a fast-paced arcade game with highly addictive gameplay and clean design. A series of multi-coloured blocks scrolls down on a regular basis. Be active and move your block up the screen! You will regularly feel that you have got it down. Your challenge in this cool HTML5 game increases with speeding up the blocks. It is up to you whether you want to enjoy this game with or without music. Get your score in the end of the game!
This beautiful arcade game for kids features seamless gameplay and colourful graphics. Being a kid, you will be able to learn how to recognize various colours. There is also a huge scope to enjoy and have fun if you are a teenager or an adult. Stay connected with us if you want to explore more engrossing arcade games! Click our top games list and find some popular games from other commonly-played game genres! We are sure you will have the best time of your life by just spending a few minutes over there.
